relation: Activities every week, organizations and Greek-life.
You learn to do with what you got.
You will learn from even those teachers you did not expect to learn from.
Don't be shy, it is not high school anymore. Be yourself and you will find your way easily.

Lawrence Tech University is what us students call a community. Everyone knows everyone because the campus is so small but that does not mean it is a bad thing. The small campus gives a feel of comfort and opportunities of building stronger relationships.
pageTitle: Lawrence Technological University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {26948=We have a few major fraternities and sororities but they aren't really useful in any way. They cost a lot of money (around $1000 the first year) and most of them will not help your academics. They are notorious for getting drunk and in trouble., 28821=This will vary extremely from person to person as it depends on your academic performance, personal financial abilities and other factors. However, I have come away debt free because I received a great scholarship from the school for having performed well in high school. If you have a 3.5 or above GPA and an 1800 SAT expect no less than $13,000 in financial aid from the university. Lawrence Tech is in the top 50 engineering schools in the country and is known in the working world as a prestigious place to have gone., 107610=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Tyler from Pleasant Lake, MI 10/13/2009 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has not been to campus. 8 out of 17 people found this review useful. 1 person found it offensive. 2 of 26 Categories Comments Bang for the buck Its a little expensive but that is something i am going to have to sacrifice. Will enjoy being here I would love nothing more than to be at Lawrence tech. Will learn a lot I am going to try my hardest to learn everything that is taught to me in the machining and engineering courses.
